thread.title: Trump's First Weeks Leave Washington---and the White House Staff---Panting
thread.title_full: Trump's First Weeks Leave Washington---and the White House Staff---Panting

title: Trump's First Weeks Leave Washington---and the White House Staff---Panting
text:
U.S. Trump’s First Weeks Leave Washington— and the White House Staff—Panting President’s freewheeling style and a torrent of meetings and executive orders created turmoil, forcing him to clarify staff roles; ‘we’re cracking some eggs here’ By Carol E. Lee and Peter Nicholas Feb. 3, 2017 6:08 p.m. ET 
President Donald Trump wasn’t happy. Sitting behind his desk in the Oval Office, he looked at the top aides assembled around him and said: “This has to go better.” 
As they spoke last weekend, protests were mushrooming at airports around the country, prompted by travel restrictions imposed by executive order on seven Muslim-majority countries... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
